name: Ball Hit
description:
Ball Hit is a Game I made a long time ago. It was one of my first 2D games and i never finished it but im just going to publish it for no reason.

Enemies and Colour Bois:

The Orange Boi:

The Orange Boi Does Nothing he Just Gives you Points When you Collide with him.

The Red Boi:

The Red Boi He Damages(Thats it :P)

The Green Boi(Healy Boi):

The Green Boi Heals you and Gives you Points.

The Time Boi:

The Time Boi Gives you the Ability to Slow down time when needed(it is very rare to find as there is only one for each round).
